Sentencas: Effective thermal integration of system components is critical to the performance of small-scale (<10 kW) solid oxide fuel cell systems.
Titulo: High-fidelity stack and system modeling for tubular solid oxide fuel cell system design and thermal management

Sentencas: This paper presents a steady-state design and simulation tool for a highly-integrated tubular SOFC system.
Titulo: High-fidelity stack and system modeling for tubular solid oxide fuel cell system design and thermal management

Sentencas: The SOFC is modeled using a high fidelity, one-dimensional tube model coupled to a three-dimensional computational fluid dynamics (CFD) model.
Titulo: High-fidelity stack and system modeling for tubular solid oxide fuel cell system design and thermal management

Sentencas: Recuperative heat exchange between SOFC tail-gas and inlet cathode air and reformer air/fuel preheat processes are captured within the CFD model.
Titulo: High-fidelity stack and system modeling for tubular solid oxide fuel cell system design and thermal management

Sentencas: Quasi one-dimensional thermal resistance models of the tail-gas combustor (TGC) and catalytic partial oxidation (CPOx) complete the balance of plant (BoP) and SOFC coupling.
Titulo: High-fidelity stack and system modeling for tubular solid oxide fuel cell system design and thermal management

Sentencas: The simulation tool is demonstrated on a prototype 66-tube SOFC system with 650W of nominal gross power.
Titulo: High-fidelity stack and system modeling for tubular solid oxide fuel cell system design and thermal management

Sentencas: Stack cooling predominately occurs at the external surface of the tubes where radiation accounts for 66-92% of heat transfer.
Titulo: High-fidelity stack and system modeling for tubular solid oxide fuel cell system design and thermal management

Sentencas: A strong relationship develops between the power output of a tube and its view factor to the relatively cold cylinder wall surrounding the bundle.
Titulo: High-fidelity stack and system modeling for tubular solid oxide fuel cell system design and thermal management

Sentencas: The bundle geometry yields seven view factor groupings which correspond to seven power groupings with tube powers ranging from 7.6-10.8W. Furthermore, the low effectiveness of the co-flow recuperator contributes to lower tube powers at the bundle outer periphery.
Titulo: High-fidelity stack and system modeling for tubular solid oxide fuel cell system design and thermal management
